channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Publishing Engine
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Publishing Engine

item.title: CVE-2018-1657|2024-09-17T00:52:19.827Z -- ibm -- rational%20publishing%20engine
item.description: IBM Publishing Engine 2.1.2, 6.0.5, and 6.0.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-force ID: 144883.

item.title: CVE-2017-1787|2024-09-17T02:36:13.998Z -- ibm -- rational%20publishing%20engine
item.description: IBM Publishing Engine 2.1.2 and 6.0.5 contains an undisclosed vulnerability that could allow a local user with administrative privileges to obtain hard coded user credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 137022.
